title: Stonebriar Selects Ivory Consulting’s SuperTRUMP
text:
Stonebriar Selects Ivory Consulting’s SuperTRUMP July 21, 2015, 07:00 AM Related: Dave Fate , Ivory Consulting , Scott Thacker , Stonebriar Commercial Finance , SuperTRUMP 
Ivory Consulting Corporation announced that Stonebriar Commercial Finance selected Ivory’s flagship product, SuperTRUMP, to support its growth as a new provider of financing solutions to a broad range of middle market and large business enterprises in the US and select foreign jurisdictions. “It is gratifying that the founders of Stonebriar, who used SuperTRUMP in their previous roles, chose to use SuperTRUMP again,” said Scott Thacker, CEO, Ivory Consulting Corporation. “We are excited to welcome Dave Fate and his team back to our family of loyal customers. Since 1983, Ivory has grown in response to our customers’ needs, and that is evident in the high level of loyalty which we enjoy.”“We plan to offer a multitude of financing products throughout the credit spectrum, including large businesses that require large, long-term financing solutions,” said Dave Fate, president and CEO of Stonebriar. “SuperTRUMP will be vital to structuring and pricing many of our product offerings.” Today's Other News
